Samsung TV

URL:

Currys

Agency:

Iris Worldwide

Challenge:

To build a collection of web pages for the various upcoming Samsung TV's, that would be compatible with the Currys/PC World CMS. The pages had to be modular as there were multiple pages each with different amounts of modules

Solution:

Before building, I had meetings with the client to discuss the needs and any build restraints from the CMS. There was a restriction on the use of SASS, so I built the pages with CSS instead.

Features:

  • ->  Compatible with the Currys/PC World CMS
  • ->  Modular build

Technology:

HTML, CSS JavsScript
